name: STRATEGIKON
headAddress: 44-48th Mihai Eminescu Street, 2nd floor, ap 5, 2nd district
goal: Strategikon is a knowledge hub, informing people who share a passion for our fields of work, fostering dialogue between decision makers and academia, and offering leadership and policy guidelines to stakeholders, in the fields of International Security, European Union Affairs, and Good Governance.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
EU reform
EU foreign and defence policy
EU future scenarios
EU energy policy
EU innovation policy
